incident_location: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa
incident_description: Policyholder Bugs Bunny reports a car accident involving his vehicle and another. According to Bugs, the incident occurred while he was stopped at a red light and the other driver collided into him from behind.

communication_logs.transcript: Policyholder: 'Hello, my name is Bugs Bunny. I'm calling to report a car accident. I was stopped at a red light, and another car hit me from behind.'
Policyholder: 'Dear Sir/Madam, I'm following up on my phone call yesterday. Attached are the pictures of the damage to my vehicle from the accident. Regards, Bugs Bunny.'

additional_information.content:
Patient: Bugs Bunny
Date of Visit: 2023-06-30
Reason for Visit: Car Accident

Patient presented with complaints of back pain following a car accident. Patient states he was rear-ended yesterday and has had persistent pain since.

Examination revealed tenderness in the lower back region. X-rays of the lumbar spine were taken and showed no fractures.

Diagnosis: Soft tissue injury

Plan: The patient was advised to rest and use over-the-counter pain medication. A follow-up appointment was scheduled for next week.
